page.title: 17BUILDINGS
page.content: Most of the{buildings}in our village are{detached}or{semi-detached}houses and bungalows. Most of them are built of{brick}with roofs of{clay tiles.} Most of the houses have{garages,} usually constructed of{brick, wood}or{ {metal. } The{village shop} is an important building. It is about{85 years old}and it is the only shop in the village. A new close of houses has just been built, called{Bulphan Green.}The close contains seven detached houses, screened by tall trees. Some of us like the new houses; they are built in a{mock-tudor}style and we feel that they brighten the place up. We don't think any more should be built though, as so many new houses are being built in the spaces between older houses and the village is beginning to look very crowded.
